Sentencas: A bioethanol processing system to feed a 200kW solid oxide fuel cell (SCFC) is simulated and evaluated in the present paper.
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: The general scheme of the process is composed of vaporization, heating, bioethanol steam reforming (ESR) and SOFC stages.
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: The performance pseudohomogeneous model of the reactor, consisting of the catalytic ESR using a Ni/Al2O3 catalyst, has been developed based on the principles of classical kinetics and thermodynamics through a complex reaction scheme and a Lagmuir-Hishelwood kinetic pattern.
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: The resulting model is employed to evaluate the effect of several design and operation parameters on the process (tube diameter between 3.81 and 7.62 cm, catalyst pellets diameter 0.1-0.5 cm, temperature 673-873 K, space time (theta) 1-10 (g min/cm(3)) and water/ethanol molar ratio (R-AE), 1-6).
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: It can be concluded that higher water/ethanol ratio (R-AE = 5: 1) and temperatures (above 773 K) favors hydrogen yield (Y-H = 4.1) and
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: selectivity (S-H = 91 %), while the heat consumed in vaporization and heating stages is strongly increased at the same conditions.
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: At temperatures above 773 K and R-AE > 6, the reforming efficiencies exhibit a plateau because of the thermodynamics constraints of the process.
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system

Sentencas: The SOFC stack is arranged in parallel and needs 83 cells of 0.4 A/cm(2) and 1 m(2).
Titulo: Bioethanol steam reforming for ecological syngas and electricity production using a fuel cell SOFC system
